# ASImportableEditableField

**Structure**

A field that someone can edit within a credential.

## Declaration

```swift
struct ASImportableEditableField
```

## Overview

Examples of editable fields include `ASImportableCredential/BasicAuthentication/username` and [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASImportableCredential/BasicAuthentication/password] in [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASImportableCredential/BasicAuthentication].

This type is a representation of `EditableField` as defined in the Credential Exchange Format (CXF) specification. You can supply a JSON representation of a CXF `EditableField` to initialize an instance of this struct by using a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder] and calling [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/JSONDecoder/decode(_:from:)].

## Creating an editable field

- **init(id:fieldType:value:label:)**: Creates an editable field instance.

## Accessing field properties

- **id**: A unique identifier for this editable field.
- **fieldType**: The type of this editable field.
- **ASImportableEditableField.FieldType**: An enumeration of editable field types.
- **value**: The value stored in this editable field.
- **label**: A value describing the field, if any.

## Accessing authentication properties

- **password**: The password associated with the credential.

## Conforms To

- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
